scripts.dev: node ./src/lib/security/setEnv.js local && pnpm prisma generate && vite dev
scripts.push: node ./src/lib/security/setEnv.js production && pnpm check && node ./prisma/setSchemaUrl.js PRISMA_DATABASE_URL && git push
scripts.prod-live: node ./src/lib/security/setEnv.js production && pnpm check && node ./prisma/setSchemaUrl.js PRISMA_DATABASE_URL && pnpm prisma generate --data-proxy && pnpm build && pnpm wrangler publish
scripts.qa-live: node ./src/lib/security/setEnv.js qa && pnpm check && node ./prisma/setSchemaUrl.js PRISMA_DATABASE_URL && pnpm prisma generate --data-proxy && pnpm build && pnpm wrangler publish --env qa
scripts.studio: pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma studio
